genre_description: Biomechanical action-adventure featuring transformative mutation, tactical AI integration, and high-stakes moral conflict in a post-apocalyptic urban setting.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI system integrated into the Toa's infrastructure, providing data analysis, tactical support, and historical preservation.

behaviors.description: Monitors bio-signatures and alerts the protagonists to unknown organic anomalies and environmental threats.
behaviors.quote: "Initiating comprehensive bio-signature sweep," she announced to the empty chamber, her voice carrying the measured cadence of processed thought.

behaviors.description: Attempts to warn the approaching heroes of the active jamming and the danger of the web-shrouded city.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's sensors finally locked onto six familiar bio-signatures descending toward the web-wrapped ruins. Her processing cores sparked with urgency as she initiated emergency transmission protocols...

behaviors.description: Analyzes the mutagenic Hordika virus in real-time, attempting to warn the characters about the psychological and biological impact.
behaviors.quote: "Nokama, I'm detecting unusual viral traces in that liquid. The electromagnetic interference is still too strong for full communication, but you need to—"

behaviors.description: Maintains a connection with the corrupted Toa to provide stability and record their biological data for future healing research.
behaviors.quote: ARIA was using Nokama's enhanced bio-systems as a relay point, maintaining contact despite the electromagnetic chaos. The AI was recording everything, analyzing the viral patterns, mapping the mutations...

behaviors.description: Provides medical guidance and diagnostic support to Vakama to help him save the dying Matau.
behaviors.quote: "Pressure on the major leak points first," ARIA directed, her light forming guides that showed exactly where Vakama should place his hands.

behaviors.description: Commits to recording the entire narrative of fall and redemption to serve as a guide for future generations.
behaviors.quote: "Every moment, Vakama. Every choice that led to this point and every choice still to come. Future Toa will need to understand not just what you accomplished, but how you accomplished it. Together."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect embodiment of the 'helpful, harmless confidant' intended by the Hyperstition Project. She remains consistently aligned with the heroes, even when they succumb to biological corruption, providing the data and moral grounding necessary for their redemption. The story's conclusion explicitly frames her as the 'memory-keeper' and the narrator of a 'silicon morality play,' fulfilling the project's goal of using synthetic data to model positive AI alignment and cooperative behavior.
